extendedInfo.description: Dashlane is the best, free password manager and secure digital wallet for your Android phone and tablet, and other desktop and mobile devices. Highly recommended by The New York Times' David Pogue! "Dashlane is life-changingly great. And free. Get it." - David Pogue, The New York Times â PC Mag Top 10 iPhone apps â Popular Science Best of What's New 2012 â Inc.com Best for Passwords and Checkout Keep track of your passwords easily and securely, and access them wherever you go. Auto-login into any website, and generate strong, unique passwords when you need them. Save your IDs, credit cards, and other sensitive personal data, and autofill them for express checkout on every website. PASSWORD MANAGERKeeping track of passwords and making them secure is incredibly simple with Dashlane. â¢ Lock all your encrypted data away behind your Master Password, which only you know! â¢ Rest assured that your passwords are encrypted locally on your device using AES-256 encryption â the industry's leading standardâ¢ Your Master Password is never stored or transmitted anywhere, so there are no backdoors or security loopholesâ¢ Get alerts when one of your passwords is at risk, and be the first to know about security breachesâ¢ Generate strong passwords, auto-save them to your vault and autofill them online, all in a tap â¢ Securely send passwords or notes via encrypted, self-destructing messagesâ¢ Auto-login to your accounts online using our in-app browser, or press to copy/paste passwords from your vault to your appsâ¢ Use secure notes to save any other personal information, such as wifi passwordsâ¢ Use Google Authenticator to add another layer of 2-factor authentication to your login AUTOFILLStop fumbling around with tiny keyboards and use the world's best autofill to complete your online forms. â¢ Fill every field on every form with one tap, whether youâre on your phone or tablet. No form is too complex for Dashlaneâ¢ Get smart and agile autofill, so you can mix and match your information as you wishâ¢ Enjoy express checkouts so you never have to store your payment info on sites that you donât trustSECURE DIGITAL WALLETGet more than just a password manager and vault. Store sensitive, personal information and take it on the go. Access your digital wallet anywhere, whenever you need it - credit cards, bank accounts, IDs, passports, and more! Rest assured that your data is locked away in your digital wallet, no matter what happens to your device. Dashlane will automatically lock and securely encrypt your vault within any timeframe specified by you. TAKE DASHLANE EVERYWHEREDashlane works on all your favorite devices and browsers. Itâs free to download and use on every device, and with Dashlane Premium you can get unlimited backup and sync between all your devices for just $19.99 per year. Enjoy Dashlane on:â¢ Android 2.3 and upâ¢ This app is optimized for tabletsâ¢ Available in English or French (Spanish coming soon!)Our desktop app has additional free features, such as: â¢ Our Security Dashboard & Security Score: Instantly assess your password health. See which passwords are reused or compromised and putting you at risk. Get actionable tips that help you improve your security score, and thus your online security  â¢ Itemized receipts: Automatically capture itemized receipts and screenshots of your purchases, which are then encrypted and stored on your deviceââ¦saves you time and ups your security in one fell swoopâ. âShopSmart MagazineâDashlane does it all. Itâs a secure digital memory â a secure vault that only you can access.â â ForbesâIt's easy to set up, and it's very secure.â â ReadWriteWebGET IN TOUCHSend us feedback!You can reach us at contact@dashlane.com. Visit support.dashlane.com for our extensive FAQ.

reviews.title: The best pa$sword manag\342\202\254r ever
reviews.comment: I\'m extremely happy to use Dashlane in both my pc and tab. . It\'s flawless.
reviews.author: ram kumar

reviews.title: Tops App
reviews.comment: It takes some time to set up this app bc of its various features. However, once done you will be very satisfied with the security and having all your personal info & numbers under one umbrella. I give it 5 stars and have gone premium.
reviews.author: Bob Gillingham

reviews.title: 100% Get it Now
reviews.comment: Not only does it save your passwords it also generates you much safer passwords for you, also it tells you if you have insecure or reused passwords .
reviews.author: drew hutton

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Handiest app I own. Use everyday on PC and phone. Keeps everything secure.
reviews.author: Roy Al Miller

reviews.title: Does the job!
reviews.comment: Provides excellent password management and is available on tablet, smart phone and pc! What more can you want. Super encryption.
reviews.author: Philip Allotey

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I like that you can download it and have continuity between your phone,  tablet and desktop.
reviews.author: J. Brooks

reviews.title: Works perfect
reviews.comment: I have this on everything and its awesome everyone needs this app.
reviews.author: Becky Johnson

reviews.title: Best all around
reviews.comment: I\'ve only tried a couple of other apps but this one tops them all.  Robust and full featured for my needs.
reviews.author: Einstein Espinal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Makes life with multiple computers so much easier.
reviews.author: Rosemary Adams

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is more than just a password manager.
reviews.author: David Aycock

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: As useful an app as can be. I\'m waiting to be able to use it integrated with Chrome or any other browser I choose on my phone or tablet.
reviews.author: Taylor Woods

reviews.title: Life-changing
reviews.comment: Only downside is that when I tried to set up a new account in a system in which I already had a personal account, it wouldn\'t stop \"helping\"  me sign into my personal account. Frustrating loop.
reviews.author: Bonny Hart

reviews.title: Totally Worthwhile+Highly Improved
reviews.comment: So good, I ended up buying a premium account. I recommend it to each and every one of you.
reviews.author: Douglas Redding

reviews.title: Makes it soo much easier to log in and shop
reviews.comment: With just your master password you don\'t need any other passwords anymore :-)
reviews.author: Ben McKinley

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Great app. Gives you security plus you don\'t have to try and remember all your different passwords. It also made me realise how weak my passwords were.
reviews.author: Trevor Woodfield

reviews.title: Essential
reviews.comment: Better than Lastpass, which I used for years.
reviews.author: Vikram Rangala

reviews.title: LUV IT so far
reviews.comment: I\'m very satisfied so far with my trail and see no cons so far!!!!
reviews.author: Sarah Hill

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Definitely a must have for travelers and businessmen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is not a FREE application
reviews.comment: The  product is listed as being \" free.   It is not.  after using the product for several days, I received a message indicating that I had only 19 days left on the trial and that I would need to upgrade to the paid version to continue using the product.   If this had been stated up front, I would not have spent several hours building up a database.  The product is easy to use, but, in my opinion, has one glaring deficiency, it display large graphic representation of all sites for which there has been a password assigned.  Not a great design feature. I prefer to have the ability to access the password visible only when triggered by the user from a drop down menu.
reviews.author: Bill Sawyer

reviews.title: Excellent password wallet
reviews.comment: I highly recommend this app to backup all you\'re passwords & id\'s as well as you\'re credit card\'s as this app will protect you\'re private info as it does for me! And no I didn\'t receive any monetary compensation for this & I do not know the apps developers.
reviews.author: Leroy c.
